short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Compare the active SERPs to another search query

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Compare the Google SERPs page that you're currently on with the SERPs of another query. 

How to use the extension: 
1. While you're on Google SERPs, press the Topical Map icon button
2. Enter in your search query you want to compare
3. Wait for the background tab to finish loading
4. The extension's popup box will give you the SERPs and Matches
